title: Unipotent groups with trivial $\mathbb{L}$-packets are easy
summary: In 2006, Boyarchenko and Drinfeld conjectured that for a unipotent algebraic group over $\overline{\mathbb{F}}_q$, every geometric point is contained in the neutral connected component of its centralizer if and only if its $\mathbb{L}$-packets of character sheaves are singletons. In 2013, Boyarchenko proved the "only if" direction of this conjecture. In this paper, we complete the proof. Along the way, we explore the relationship between general algebraic groups satisfying this property and their Asai twisting operator.

AI.tldr: 本文完成了Boyarchenko-Drinfeld猜想的证明，该猜想涉及单幂代数群的中心化子中性连通分量与特征层L-包单点性之间的关系。
AI.motivation: Boyarchenko和Drinfeld在2006年提出了一个猜想：对于有限域闭包上的单幂代数群，每个几何点都包含在其中心化子的中性连通分量中，当且仅当其特征层的L-包是单点集。2013年Boyarchenko证明了"仅当"方向，本文旨在完成整个猜想的证明。
AI.method: 通过探索满足该性质的一般代数群与其Asai扭曲算子之间的关系，建立了完整的证明框架。利用代数群理论和特征层理论的方法，结合几何表示论的工具。
AI.result: 成功证明了Boyarchenko-Drinfeld猜想的"当"方向，从而完成了整个猜想的证明。建立了代数群满足该性质与Asai扭曲算子之间的明确关系。
AI.conclusion: 本文完整证明了Boyarchenko-Drinfeld猜想，揭示了单幂代数群的中心化子结构与特征层L-包单点性之间的深刻联系，为代数群表示论提供了重要结果。

title: The McKay conjecture with group automorphisms and the Okuyama-Wajima argument
comment: Accepted in the Journal of Pure and Applied Algebra
summary: Let $N$ be normal subgroup of a finite group $G$, $p$ be a prime, $P$ be a Sylow $p$-subgroup of $G$ and $θ$ be a $P$-invariant irreducible character of $N$. Suppose that $G/N$ is a $p$-solvable group. In this note we show that, whenever a finite group $A$ acts on $G$ stabilizing $P$, there exists an $A$-equivariant McKay bijection between irreducible characters lying over $θ$ of degree prime to $p$ of $G$ and $\textbf{N}_G(P)$. This is a consequence of a recent result of D. Rossi. Our approach here is independent from Rossi's and follows the original idea of the proof of the McKay conjecture for $p$-solvable groups. In particular, we rely on the so-called Okuyama-Wajima argument to deal with characters above Glauberman correspondents. For this purpose, we generalize a classical result of P. X. Gallagher on the number of irreducible characters of $G$ lying over $θ$.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了在p-可解群条件下，关于P-不变不可约特征标的A-等变McKay双射的存在性。
AI.motivation: 研究在p-可解群条件下，当有限群A作用在G上并稳定Sylow p-子群P时，能否建立关于P-不变不可约特征标的A-等变McKay双射。
AI.method: 采用独立于D. Rossi的方法，遵循p-可解群McKay猜想的原始证明思路，使用Okuyama-Wajima论证处理Glauberman对应上的特征标，并推广了P. X. Gallagher关于G在θ上不可约特征标数量的经典结果。
AI.result: 证明了当G/N是p-可解群时，存在A-等变McKay双射，将G中在θ上且次数与p互质的不可约特征标与N_G(P)中的相应特征标对应起来。
AI.conclusion: 该结果是D. Rossi近期结果的推论，但提供了独立的证明方法，为p-可解群条件下的特征标对应问题提供了新的视角和工具。

title: Compactification of metric moduli space of $K3$ surfaces
summary: We prove a conjecture of Odaka--Oshima, which says that there is an algebraic description of the Gromov--Hausdorff compactification of all unit-diameter hyperkähler metrics on K3 surfaces. As a corollary, we obtain a classification of the Gromov--Hausdorff limits of those hyperkähler K3 surfaces with a fixed complex structure or with a fixed polarization.

AI.tldr: 证明了Odaka-Oshima猜想，给出了K3曲面上单位直径超凯勒度量的Gromov-Hausdorff紧化的代数描述，并获得了固定复结构或极化下超凯勒K3曲面的Gromov-Hausdorff极限分类。
AI.motivation: 研究K3曲面上单位直径超凯勒度量的Gromov-Hausdorff紧化问题，验证Odaka-Oshima猜想，为超凯勒K3曲面的度量紧化提供代数描述。
AI.method: 通过数学证明方法，验证Odaka-Oshima猜想，建立单位直径超凯勒度量Gromov-Hausdorff紧化的代数描述框架。
AI.result: 成功证明了Odaka-Oshima猜想，获得了超凯勒K3曲面在固定复结构或极化条件下的Gromov-Hausdorff极限的完整分类。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为K3曲面上超凯勒度量的紧化问题提供了代数描述，深化了对超凯勒几何与代数几何之间联系的理解。

title: Intervals of torsion pairs and generalized Happel-Reiten-Smalø tilting
summary: Let $\mathcal{A}$ be an abelian category with a torsion pair $(\mathcal{T},\mathcal{F})$. Happel-Reiten-Smalo tilting provides a method to construct a new abelian category $\mathcal{B}$ with a torsion pair associated to $(\mathcal{T},\mathcal{F})$, which is exactly the heart of a certain $t$-structure on the bounded derived category $D^b(\mathcal{A})$. In this paper, we mainly study generalized HRS tilting. We first show that an interval of torsion pairs in extriangulated categories with negative first extensions is bijectively associated with torsion pairs in the corresponding heart, which yields several new observations in triangulated categories. Then we obtain a generalization of HRS tilting by replacing hearts of $t$-structures with extended hearts. As an application, we show that certain $t$-structures on triangulated subcategories can be extended to $t$-structures on the whole triangulated categories.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了广义HRS倾斜，将Happel-Reiten-Smalo倾斜从三角范畴推广到外三角范畴，建立了挠对区间与对应心挠对之间的双射关系，并应用于t-结构的扩展。
AI.motivation: Happel-Reiten-Smalo倾斜在阿贝尔范畴中提供了一种构造新阿贝尔范畴的方法，但需要推广到更一般的范畴设置，特别是外三角范畴和三角范畴，以建立更一般的理论框架和应用。
AI.method: 首先证明在外三角范畴中，具有负一阶扩张的挠对区间与对应心的挠对之间存在双射关系；然后通过用扩展心替换t-结构的心，获得HRS倾斜的推广；最后将此结果应用于三角子范畴t-结构到整个三角范畴的扩展。
AI.result: 建立了挠对区间与心挠对之间的双射对应关系，获得了广义HRS倾斜理论，并证明了某些三角子范畴上的t-结构可以扩展到整个三角范畴上。
AI.conclusion: 本文成功将HRS倾斜推广到更一般的范畴设置，建立了挠对与t-结构之间的新联系，为三角范畴理论提供了新的工具和视角。

title: AIR tilting subcategories of extended hearts
summary: We introduce the notion of AIR tilting subcategories of extended hearts of $t$-structures on a triangulated category associated with silting subcategories. This notion extends $τ_{[d]}$-tilting pairs of extended finitely generated modules over finite-dimensional algebras to a broader framework, encompassing extended large modules over unitary rings as well as truncated subcategories of finite-dimensional derived categories of proper non-positive differential graded algebras. Within this framework, we establish a bijection between AIR tilting subcategories and silting subcategories. We further define quasi-tilting and tilting subcategories of extended hearts, generalizing the corresponding notions in module categories, and investigate their fundamental properties and the relationships among these three tilting-related concepts.

AI.tldr: 该论文引入了AIR倾斜子范畴的概念，将其作为三角范畴中与倾斜子范畴相关的t-结构扩展心的子范畴，扩展了有限维代数上的τ_[d]-倾斜对概念，并建立了AIR倾斜子范畴与倾斜子范畴之间的双射关系。
AI.motivation: 将有限维代数上的τ_[d]-倾斜对概念扩展到更广泛的框架中，包括酉环上的扩展大模以及有限维导出范畴的截断子范畴，为倾斜理论提供更一般的理论框架。
AI.method: 引入AIR倾斜子范畴的概念，定义扩展心的拟倾斜和倾斜子范畴，研究这些倾斜相关概念的基本性质及其相互关系，建立AIR倾斜子范畴与倾斜子范畴之间的双射对应。
AI.result: 成功建立了AIR倾斜子范畴与倾斜子范畴之间的双射关系，将τ_[d]-倾斜对理论扩展到更广泛的代数结构中，为倾斜理论提供了统一的理论框架。
AI.conclusion: AIR倾斜子范畴的概念成功地将有限维代数上的倾斜理论扩展到更广泛的范畴框架中，建立了倾斜子范畴与扩展心子范畴之间的对应关系，为倾斜理论的进一步发展提供了新的视角和工具。

title: Theta correspondence and Springer correspondence
summary: In this paper, we obtain an explicit formula for the theta correspondence of unipotent principal-series representations between an even orthogonal and a symplectic group or between general linear groups over a finite field. The formula is in terms of the Springer correspondence. Along the way we prove general results about module categories of Hecke categories arising from spherical varieties, and give a similar formula for the multiplicities of the unipotent principal series representations in the function space of the spherical variety in terms of relative Springer theory.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了有限域上偶正交群与辛群之间或一般线性群之间单主级数表示的theta对应的显式公式，该公式基于Springer对应关系。
AI.motivation: 研究有限域上不同李型群之间单主级数表示的theta对应关系，旨在建立Springer对应与表示论之间的明确联系。
AI.method: 通过研究球面变体产生的Hecke范畴的模范畴，利用相对Springer理论，推导出theta对应的显式公式。
AI.result: 获得了偶正交群与辛群之间或一般线性群之间单主级数表示theta对应的显式公式，并给出了球面变体函数空间中单主级数表示重数的类似公式。
AI.conclusion: 成功建立了Springer对应与theta对应之间的明确关系，为有限域上李型群的表示论提供了新的计算工具和理论框架。

title: Lie Superalgebras and Generalized Kazhdan-Lusztig Polynomials
summary: We present `liesuperalg` a SageMath package for representation-theoretic calculations involving Lie superalgebras in Type A. Our package introduces functionality to calculate invariants of weights and produce the associated cup diagrams. We expose functionality to calculate characters of irreducible representations, work with combinatorics of generalized Kazhdan-Lusztig polynomials, and determine composition factor multiplicities of indecomposable modules. Our package implements an algorithm to decompose arbitrary modules in terms of irreducible ones in the Grothendeick group of Lie superalgebra representations.

AI.tldr: SageMath包`liesuperalg`用于A型李超代数的表示论计算，提供权重不变量、杯图、不可约表示特征标、广义Kazhdan-Lusztig多项式组合学等功能
AI.motivation: 开发一个专门用于A型李超代数表示论计算的工具包，填补SageMath在该领域的空白，为研究人员提供便捷的计算功能
AI.method: 开发SageMath包`liesuperalg`，实现算法计算权重不变量、生成杯图、计算不可约表示特征标、处理广义Kazhdan-Lusztig多项式组合学，以及分解任意模为不可约模的算法
AI.result: 成功开发了功能完整的SageMath包，能够进行A型李超代数的各种表示论计算，包括权重不变量计算、杯图生成、特征标计算、组合学处理以及模分解
AI.conclusion: `liesuperalg`包为A型李超代数的表示论研究提供了强大的计算工具，简化了复杂的表示论计算，有助于推进该领域的研究

title: An explicit exotic representation of a rank-one simple Lie group via convex bodies
summary: In [DP12], Delzant and Py showed that there exist continuous irreducible isometric actions of $\mathrm{PSL}_2(\mathbb{R})$ on the infinite-dimensional hyperbolic space $\mathbb{H}^\infty$. Such continuous irreducible actions do not exist on the hyperbolic spaces $\mathbb{H}^n$ when $n>2$ and their associated embeddings $\mathbb{H}^2 \to \mathbb{H}^\infty$ given by the orbit maps were later called exotic by Monod and Py in [MP14]. In this article, we produce a continuous and irreducible representation of $\mathrm{PSL}_2(\mathbb{R})\to \mathrm{Isom}(\mathbb{H}^\infty)$ using the hyperbolic model for convex bodies introduced in [DF22]. This yields a convex cocompact $\mathrm{PSL}_2(\mathbb{R})$-action on the infinite-dimensional hyperbolic space $\mathbb{H}^\infty$, of which the compact quotient over the minimal $\mathrm{PSL}_2(\mathbb{R})$-invariant convex set is homeomorphic to the 2-dimensional oriented Banach--Mazur compactum. Moreover, we study the geometry of one of its orbit maps and compute the Hausdorff dimension of the limit set of this representation.

AI.tldr: 该论文构造了PSL₂(ℝ)在无限维双曲空间ℍ^∞上的连续不可约表示，产生凸余紧作用，其商空间同胚于2维定向Banach-Mazur紧化，并计算了表示极限集的Hausdorff维数。
AI.motivation: Delzant和Py在[DP12]中证明了PSL₂(ℝ)在无限维双曲空间ℍ^∞上存在连续不可约等距作用，这种作用在n>2的ℍ^n上不存在。Monod和Py在[MP14]中将相关的轨道映射称为"奇异"嵌入。本文旨在利用[DF22]中引入的凸体双曲模型，构造这样的连续不可约表示。
AI.method: 使用[DF22]中引入的凸体双曲模型，构造PSL₂(ℝ)→Isom(ℍ^∞)的连续不可约表示。该方法产生了一个在无限维双曲空间ℍ^∞上的凸余紧PSL₂(ℝ)作用。
AI.result: 成功构造了连续不可约表示PSL₂(ℝ)→Isom(ℍ^∞)，产生了在ℍ^∞上的凸余紧作用。该作用的最小PSL₂(ℝ)不变凸集上的紧商空间同胚于2维定向Banach-Mazur紧化。同时研究了其中一个轨道映射的几何性质，并计算了该表示极限集的Hausdorff维数。
AI.conclusion: 本文成功实现了PSL₂(ℝ)在无限维双曲空间ℍ^∞上的连续不可约凸余紧作用，建立了与Banach-Mazur紧化的联系，并量化了极限集的几何复杂度。这扩展了先前关于双曲空间上群作用的研究，特别是在无限维情形下的奇异构造。

title: Skew-symmetrizable cluster algebras from surfaces and symmetric quivers
summary:
We study skew-symmetrizable cluster algebras $\mathcal{A}$ associated with unpunctured surfaces $\mathbf{S}$ endowed with an orientation-preserving involution $σ$. Cluster variables of $\mathcal{A}$ correspond to $σ$-orbits of arcs of $\mathbf{S}$, while clusters are given by admissible $σ$-invariant ideal triangulations. We provide a cluster expansion formula for any $σ$-orbit $[γ]$ in terms of perfect matchings of some labeled modified snake graphs constructed from the arcs of $[γ]$. Then, we associate a symmetric finite-dimensional algebra $A$ to any seed of $\mathcal{A}$, such that non-initial cluster variables bijectively correspond to orthogonal indecomposable $A$-modules. Finally, we exhibit a purely representation-theoretic map from the category of orthogonal $A$-modules to $\mathcal{A}$.
  If $\mathbf{S}$ is a regular polygon, we recover the results proved in arXiv:2403.11308, arXiv:2405.14915, and arXiv:2502.06410 for cluster algebras of type B.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究具有对称性的曲面上的斜对称化丛代数，建立了丛变量与对称轨道、完美匹配、正交模之间的对应关系。
AI.motivation: 研究具有对称性的曲面上的丛代数结构，将几何、组合和表示论方法相结合，推广B型丛代数的结果到更一般的对称曲面情形。
AI.method: 1. 使用具有保定向对合的未穿孔曲面构造斜对称化丛代数；2. 通过修改的蛇图完美匹配给出丛展开公式；3. 将种子关联到对称有限维代数，建立正交不可分解模与丛变量的对应；4. 构造从正交模范畴到丛代数的表示论映射。
AI.result: 1. 建立了对称轨道与丛变量的对应关系；2. 给出了基于完美匹配的丛展开公式；3. 证明了正交不可分解模与丛变量的双射对应；4. 构造了表示论到丛代数的映射；5. 当曲面为正多边形时，恢复了B型丛代数的已知结果。
AI.conclusion: 该工作将B型丛代数的几何模型推广到更一般的对称曲面，建立了几何、组合和表示论之间的深刻联系，为研究对称丛代数提供了统一框架。

title: Moduli stacks of quiver connections and non-Abelian Hodge theory
summary: In arXiv:2407.11958, a moduli stack parametrizing $I$--indexed diagrams of Higgs bundles over a base stack $X$ was constructed for any finite simplicial set $I$, inspiring speculations about extending the non-Abelian Hodge correspondence to these moduli stacks. In the present work, we formalize the de Rham side of this conjectural extension. We construct moduli stacks parametrizing diagrams of bundles with $λ$--connections over a base prestack $X$, where $λ$ can be a fixed number or a parameter. Taking $λ$ to be $1$ gives a moduli stack parametrizing diagrams of bundles with connection, while taking it to be a parameter gives a version of Simpson's non-Abelian Hodge filtration for digrams of bundles with connection. We show that when $X$ is a smooth and projective scheme over an algebraically closed field $k$ of characteristic $0$, these moduli stacks are algebraic and locally of finite presentation, and have affine diagonal.

AI.tldr: 该论文为arXiv:2407.11958的后续工作，形式化了非阿贝尔霍奇对应猜想扩展中的de Rham侧，构造了参数化带λ-连接的丛图的模叠，建立了辛普森非阿贝尔霍奇滤过在丛图上的版本。
AI.motivation: 先前工作arXiv:2407.11958构造了参数化希格斯丛图的模叠，启发了将非阿贝尔霍奇对应扩展到这些模叠的猜想。本文旨在形式化这一猜想扩展中的de Rham侧。
AI.method: 构造了参数化带λ-连接的丛图的模叠，其中λ可以是固定数或参数。当λ=1时得到带连接的丛图模叠；当λ为参数时得到辛普森非阿贝尔霍奇滤过的丛图版本。
AI.result: 当X是特征0代数闭域上的光滑射影概形时，证明这些模叠是代数的、局部有限表示的，且具有仿射对角线。
AI.conclusion: 成功形式化了非阿贝尔霍奇对应猜想扩展中的de Rham侧，为丛图建立了完整的模叠理论，为后续研究非阿贝尔霍奇对应的扩展奠定了基础。

title: Hodge filtration and crystalline representations of $\mathrm{GL}_n$
comment: 135 pages, with an appendix by Zhixiang Wu
summary: Let $p$ be a prime number, $n$ an integer $\geq 2$ and $ρ$ an $n$-dimensional automorphic $p$-adic Galois representation (for a compact unitary group) such that $r:=ρ\vert_{\mathrm{Gal}(\overline{\mathbb{Q}_p}/\mathbb{Q}_p)}$ is crystalline. Under a mild assumption on the Frobenius eigenvalues of $D:=D_{\mathrm{cris}}(r)$ and under the usual Taylor-Wiles conditions, we show that the locally analytic representation of $\mathrm{GL}_n(\mathbb{Q}_p)$ associated to $ρ$ in the corresponding Hecke eigenspace of the completed $H^0$ contains an explicit finite length subrepresentation which determines and only depends on $r$. This generalizes previous results of the second author which assumed that the Hodge filtration on $D$ was as generic as possible. Our approach provides a much more explicit link to this Hodge filtration (in all cases), which allows to study the internal structure of this finite length locally analytic subrepresentation.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究p-adic Galois表示与局部解析表示的关系，在更一般的Hodge过滤条件下，证明了GL_n(Q_p)的局部解析表示包含一个明确有限长度子表示，该子表示仅依赖于局部Galois表示r。
AI.motivation: 先前研究假设Hodge过滤尽可能一般化，限制了结果的适用范围。本文旨在放宽这一假设，在更一般的Hodge过滤条件下建立p-adic Galois表示与局部解析表示之间的明确联系。
AI.method: 在Frobenius特征值的温和假设和Taylor-Wiles条件下，通过分析结晶Galois表示r的Hodge过滤，构造GL_n(Q_p)的局部解析表示中的有限长度子表示。方法提供了与Hodge过滤的明确联系。
AI.result: 证明了在相应Hecke特征空间的完备H^0中，与ρ相关的GL_n(Q_p)局部解析表示包含一个明确有限长度子表示，该子表示由且仅由局部Galois表示r决定，推广了先前需要Hodge过滤尽可能一般的结果。
AI.conclusion: 本文成功推广了先前结果，在更一般的Hodge过滤条件下建立了p-adic Galois表示与局部解析表示之间的明确对应关系，为研究该有限长度局部解析子表示的内部结构提供了工具。

title: Structure and Invariants of Weyl-Type Algebras with Hyperbolic Sine Generators
summary: This paper introduces and systematically studies a class of Weyl-type algebras enriched with hyperbolic sine and power generators over a field of characteristic zero, defined as $A_{p,t,\cA} = \Weyl{\sinh(\pm x^{p} \sinh(t)),\; \sinh(\cA x),\; x^{\cA}}$ in the associative setting and $\Nass{\sinh(\pm x^{p} \sinh(t)),\; \sinh(\cA x),\; x^{\cA}}$ in a non-associative framework. We establish fundamental structural properties, including the triviality of the center for the non-associative version and the explicit description $Z(A_{p,t,\cA}) = \FF[\sinh(\pm x^{p} \sinh(t))]$ for the associative one, proving that $A_{p,t,\cA}$ is an Azumaya algebra over its center and represents a nontrivial class in the Brauer group $\Br(\FF(y))$. Furthermore, we compute the Gelfand--Kirillov dimension for relevant examples and demonstrate its key properties, such as additivity under tensor products and the growth dichotomy. We completely characterize the automorphism group of $A_{p,t,\cA}$ as a semidirect product of a torus with a discrete group, and provide a sharp isomorphism criterion showing that the parameter $t$ is a complete invariant in the family. The paper concludes with two open problems concerning the GK dimension of non-associative hyperbolic sine algebras and the classification of their deformations, pointing toward future research directions in non-associative growth theory and deformation rigidity.

AI.tldr: 本文系统研究了一类在特征零域上由双曲正弦和幂生成元增强的Weyl型代数，建立了其结构性质、中心描述、Gelfand-Kirillov维数计算和自同构群分类。
AI.motivation: 研究在特征零域上由双曲正弦函数和幂函数生成元构造的Weyl型代数，探索其代数结构、表示理论和分类问题，为双曲函数代数和非结合代数的研究提供新方向。
AI.method: 定义结合版本 $A_{p,t,\cA} = \Weyl{\sinh(\pm x^{p} \sinh(t)),\; \sinh(\cA x),\; x^{\cA}}$ 和非结合版本 $\Nass{\sinh(\pm x^{p} \sinh(t)),\; \sinh(\cA x),\; x^{\cA}}$，系统研究其代数结构、中心性质、Gelfand-Kirillov维数、自同构群和分类问题。
AI.result: 1. 非结合版本的中心是平凡的；结合版本的中心为 $\FF[\sinh(\pm x^{p} \sinh(t))]$；2. $A_{p,t,\cA}$ 是其中心上的Azumaya代数，在Brauer群 $\Br(\FF(y))$ 中代表非平凡类；3. 计算了相关例子的GK维数，证明了其在张量积下的可加性和增长二分性；4. 完全刻画了自同构群为环面与离散群的半直积；5. 参数 $t$ 是该代数族的完全不变量。
AI.conclusion: 系统建立了双曲正弦Weyl型代数的完整理论框架，提出了两个开放问题：非结合双曲正弦代数的GK维数计算和其形变分类，为未来的非结合增长理论和形变刚性研究指明了方向。

title: Module structure of Weyl algebras
summary: The seminal paper "J.T. Stafford, Module structure of Weyl algebras, J. London Math. Soc. (2) 18 (1978), no. 3, 429--442" was a major step forward in our understanding of Weyl algebras. Beginning with Serre's Theorem on free summands of projective modules and Bass' Stable Range Theorem in commutative algebra, we attempt to trace the origins of this work and explain how it led to Stafford's construction of non-holonomic simple modules over Weyl algebras. We also describe Bernstein-Lunt's geometric construction of infinite families of non-holonomic simple modules. We recall more recent developments related to Weyl algebras, especially that of parametrizing right ideals in the first Weyl algebra and its relation to Calogero-Moser spaces. Finally, we revisit Stafford's results in the context of quantized symplectic singularities, where they lead naturally to open problems on the behaviour of simple modules.

AI.tldr: 该论文回顾了Stafford关于Weyl代数模结构的研究，追溯了从Serre定理和Bass稳定范围定理到Stafford构造非全纯简单模的历程，并讨论了后续发展如Bernstein-Lunt几何构造、Calogero-Moser空间联系，以及在量子辛奇点背景下的推广。
AI.motivation: 旨在梳理和理解Stafford在Weyl代数模结构方面的开创性工作，追溯其数学思想的起源，并展示这一研究如何推动了后续关于非全纯简单模、Calogero-Moser空间以及量子辛奇点等领域的发展。
AI.method: 采用历史回顾和理论分析的方法，从Serre定理和Bass稳定范围定理出发，逐步展示Stafford如何利用这些工具构造Weyl代数的非全纯简单模，并对比Bernstein-Lunt的几何构造方法，最后将结果推广到量子辛奇点背景。
AI.result: 系统阐述了Stafford构造非全纯简单模的关键思想，展示了Bernstein-Lunt的无限族构造方法，建立了第一Weyl代数右理想参数化与Calogero-Moser空间的联系，并将Stafford结果推广到量子辛奇点背景，提出了相关开放问题。
AI.conclusion: Stafford的工作是Weyl代数表示理论的重要里程碑，其思想和方法不仅解决了非全纯简单模的存在性问题，还为后续研究开辟了新方向，特别是在量子辛奇点背景下提出了关于简单模行为的有趣开放问题。

title: Translation--Modulation Identities, Ergodic Log-Products and a Conditional Obstruction for Schwartz Functions
summary:
We study very smooth functions on the real line, namely Schwartz functions, that satisfy a finite identity relating their translates and a single modulation. Concretely, we assume there is a nontrivial linear combination of translates of the function that equals a fixed frequency shift of the same function.
  Passing to the Fourier transform turns this into a multiplicative transfer relation: the value of the Fourier transform at one point is obtained by multiplying its value at another point by a trigonometric polynomial. Iterating this relation expresses the Fourier transform along an arithmetic progression as a product of such trigonometric factors times a fixed initial value. We then recast this product in an ergodic theoretic framework by viewing it as a Birkhoff sum for a continuous observable on a compact abelian group generated by a diagonal unitary matrix. The key quantity controlling the growth or decay of the Fourier transform along the progression is a space average, namely the integral over the compact group of the logarithm of the absolute value of the associated trigonometric polynomial. The main rigorously proved statement is the following. If, for some frequency where the Fourier transform does not vanish along the entire progression, this space average is nonzero, or if the average is zero but a certain recurrence set, in the sense of Atkinson's theorem, intersects a distinguished one-parameter subgroup, then the assumed translation--modulation identity forces exponential growth of the Fourier transform along some sequence of points. This contradicts the rapid decay required of a Schwartz function.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究满足平移-调制恒等式的Schwartz函数，通过傅里叶变换和遍历理论分析，证明这类函数要么不存在，要么傅里叶变换沿算术级数呈指数增长，与Schwartz函数的快速衰减性质矛盾。
AI.motivation: 研究实线上非常光滑的Schwartz函数，这些函数满足一个有限的平移和单个调制的恒等关系。具体来说，假设存在函数平移的非平凡线性组合等于该函数的固定频率平移。这种结构在调和分析和信号处理中具有理论意义。
AI.method: 1. 将平移-调制恒等式通过傅里叶变换转化为乘法传递关系；2. 沿算术级数迭代该关系，将傅里叶变换表示为三角多项式乘积；3. 将乘积重新表述为遍历理论框架中的Birkhoff和；4. 使用Atkinson定理和遍历理论工具分析傅里叶变换的增长行为。
AI.result: 如果傅里叶变换在某个频率处沿整个算术级数不消失，且相关三角多项式的对数绝对值的空间平均非零，或者平均为零但特定递归集与特殊单参数子群相交，则傅里叶变换沿某些点序列呈指数增长。这与Schwartz函数的快速衰减性质矛盾。
AI.conclusion: 满足所假设的平移-调制恒等式的非平凡Schwartz函数不存在，因为其傅里叶变换要么沿算术级数呈指数增长（与Schwartz性质矛盾），要么必须满足非常严格的遍历理论条件。这为这类特殊函数的分类提供了严格限制。

title: An enhanced extriangulated subquotient
summary: Bondal-Kapranov's notion of enhanced triangulated categories behaves well in the framework of localization theory, in the sense that the Verdier quotient of triangulated categories can be lifted to the Drinfeld dg quotient of pretriangulated dg categories. In this paper, we develop a parallel enhancement for Nakaoka-Palu's notion of extriangulated categories, which unifies exact and triangulated categories. The enhancement of extriangulated categories was recently initiated by Xiaofa Chen under the name exact dg categories. Moreover, it is known that certain ideal quotients of extriangulated categories remain extriangulated, and that such ideal quotients admit dg enhancements via the dg quotient of the corresponding connective exact dg category. Motivated by Chen's framework of enhanced extriangulated categories, we introduce the concept of a cohomological envelope of an exact dg category and generalize his construction of the enhanced ideal quotient. We show that the dg quotient of exact dg categories, when passing to cohomological envelopes and their substructures -- referred to as exact dg subquotients -- is compatible with a broad class of extriangulated quotients in the sense of Nakaoka-Ogawa-Sakai. To further clarify the scope of our approach, we formulate the notion of an extriangulated subquotient, which enables the localization of any extriangulated category by extension-closed subcategories. This construction encompasses not only ideal and Verdier quotients, but also the quotient of an exact category by a biresolving subcategory. Notably, the extriangulated subquotient admits a natural lifting to the exact dg subquotient.

AI.tldr: 本文扩展了Chen关于外三角范畴的增强理论，引入了上同调包络和精确dg子商的概念，建立了外三角商与精确dg商之间的兼容性。
AI.motivation: Bondal-Kapranov的增强三角范畴在局部化理论中表现良好，但外三角范畴的增强理论尚不完善。本文旨在发展外三角范畴的并行增强理论，统一精确范畴和三角范畴的商构造。
AI.method: 引入精确dg范畴的上同调包络概念，推广Chen的增强理想商构造。提出精确dg子商和外三角子商的概念，建立dg商与外三角商之间的兼容性框架。
AI.result: 证明了精确dg范畴的dg商在通过上同调包络及其子结构时，与Nakaoka-Ogawa-Sakai意义下的广泛外三角商类兼容。外三角子商可以自然地提升为精确dg子商。
AI.conclusion: 本文建立了一个统一的外三角范畴增强理论框架，能够处理包括理想商、Verdier商和精确范畴商在内的多种商构造，为外三角范畴的局部化理论提供了dg增强基础。

title: A Drinfeld Presentation of the Queer Super-Yangian
comment: A new section about the center of Yqn has been added in version 2
summary: We introduce a Drinfeld presentation for the super-Yangian $\mathrm{Y}(\mathfrak{q}_n)$ associated with the queer Lie superalgebra $\mathfrak{q}_n$. The Drinfeld generators of $\mathrm{Y}(\mathfrak{q}_n)$ are obtained through a block Gauss decomposition of the generator matrix in its RTT presentation, and the Drinfeld relations are explicitly computed by utilizing a block version of its RTT relations. As a byproduct, we obtain a new expression for the central series of $\mathrm{Y}(\mathfrak{q}_n)$ in terms of Gauss generators.

AI.tldr: 该论文为超Yangian代数Y(q_n)引入了Drinfeld表示，通过块Gauss分解RTT表示中的生成元矩阵得到Drinfeld生成元，并利用块RTT关系计算了Drinfeld关系式。
AI.motivation: 为queer李超代数q_n相关的超Yangian代数Y(q_n)建立Drinfeld表示，这种表示在量子群理论中具有重要意义，能提供更简洁的代数结构描述。
AI.method: 采用块Gauss分解技术，从Y(q_n)的RTT表示中的生成元矩阵出发，得到Drinfeld生成元。然后利用块版本的RTT关系显式计算Drinfeld关系式。
AI.result: 成功获得了Y(q_n)的Drinfeld表示，包括Drinfeld生成元和它们之间的明确关系式。作为副产品，还得到了用Gauss生成元表示的Y(q_n)中心级数的新表达式。
AI.conclusion: 该工作为queer李超代数相关的超Yangian建立了Drinfeld表示，这一表示形式在理论物理和数学物理中具有重要应用价值，并为相关代数结构的研究提供了新工具。

title: Stiefel-Whitney Classes for Finite Symplectic Groups
summary: Let $q$ be an odd prime power, and $G=\text{Sp}(2n,q)$ the finite symplectic group. We give an expression for the total Stiefel-Whitney Classes (SWCs) for orthogonal representations $π$ of $G$, in terms of character values of $π$ at elements of order $2$. We give "universal formulas'' for the fourth and eighth SWCs. For $n=2$, we compute the subring of the mod $2$ cohomology generated by the SWCs $w_k(π)$.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了有限辛群Sp(2n,q)的正交表示的Stiefel-Whitney类，给出了用二阶元素特征值表示的通用公式，并计算了n=2时的模2上同调子环。
AI.motivation: 研究有限辛群正交表示的Stiefel-Whitney类的计算方法，建立特征值与拓扑不变量之间的联系，为理解这些群的表示论和拓扑性质提供新工具。
AI.method: 通过分析有限辛群Sp(2n,q)的正交表示，利用二阶元素的特征值推导Stiefel-Whitney类的表达式，特别给出了第四和第八Stiefel-Whitney类的"通用公式"，并对n=2的情况进行具体计算。
AI.result: 成功建立了Stiefel-Whitney类与特征值之间的关系表达式，获得了第四和第八Stiefel-Whitney类的通用计算公式，并计算了n=2时由Stiefel-Whitney类生成的模2上同调子环。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为有限辛群正交表示的拓扑不变量计算提供了系统方法，建立了表示论特征值与拓扑不变量之间的具体联系，对相关领域的研究具有重要理论价值。

title: Yang-Baxter extremal characters of wreath products of finite groups with the infinite symmetric group
summary: Let $T$ be a finite group. To a representation $π$ of $T$ and an involutive solution of the Yang-Baxter equation (an $R$-matrix) verifying the "extended" reflection equation, we associate a character and a representation of the wreath product $G:=T\wr \mathfrak{S}_\infty$. The set of extremal characters of $G$ is in bijection with a continuous set of parameters. In this article, we characterize exactly what subset of parameters does correspond to an extremal Yang-Baxter character of $G$.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了通过Yang-Baxter方程和反射方程构造的wreath积群的极值特征标，并精确刻画了哪些参数对应极值Yang-Baxter特征标。
AI.motivation: 研究有限群T的表示与Yang-Baxter方程解如何关联到wreath积群G的特征标表示，特别是确定哪些参数对应极值特征标。
AI.method: 通过有限群T的表示π和满足"扩展"反射方程的R-矩阵，构造wreath积群G:=T≀𝔖∞的特征标和表示，分析参数空间与极值特征标的对应关系。
AI.result: 建立了G的极值特征标与连续参数集的双射，并精确刻画了参数集中哪些子集对应极值Yang-Baxter特征标。
AI.conclusion: 成功确定了通过Yang-Baxter方程构造的wreath积群极值特征标的参数条件，为这类代数结构的表示理论提供了新的理解。

title: On t-structures adjacent and orthogonal to weight structures
summary:
We study $t$-structures (on triangulated categories) that are closely related to weight structures.
  A $t$-structure couple $t=(C_{t\le 0},C_{t\ge 0})$ is said to be adjacent to a weight structure $w=(C_{w\le 0}, C_{w\ge 0})$ if $C_{t\ge 0}=C_{w\ge 0}$.
  For a category $C$ that satisfies the Brown representability property we prove that $t$ that is adjacent to $w$ exists if and only if $w$ is smashing (that is, "respects C-coproducts"). The heart $Ht$ of this $t$ is the category of those functors $Hw^{op}\to Ab$ that respect products (here $Hw$ is the heart of $w$); the result has important applications.
  We prove several more statements on constructing $t$-structures starting from weight structures; we look for a strictly orthogonal $t$-structure $t$ on some $C'$ (where $C,C'$ are triangulated subcategories of a common $D$) such that $C'_{t\le 0}$ (resp. $C'_{t\ge 0}$) is characterized by the vanishing of morphisms from $C_{w\ge 1}$ (resp. $C_{w\le -1}$). Some of these results generalize properties of semi-orthogonal decompositions proved in the previous paper, and can be applied to various derived categories of (quasi)coherent sheaves on a scheme $X$ that is projective over an affine noetherian one. We also study hearts of orthogonal $t$-structures and their restrictions, and prove some statements on "reconstructing" weight structures from orthogonal $t$-structures.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了与权结构密切相关的t-结构，证明了在满足Brown表示性质的范畴中，与权结构相邻的t-结构存在当且仅当权结构是smashing的，并探讨了从权结构构造t-结构的方法及其在导出范畴中的应用。
AI.motivation: 研究t-结构与权结构之间的密切关系，特别是当t-结构与权结构相邻时的存在条件和性质。这种关系对于理解三角范畴中的结构理论以及应用于代数几何中的导出范畴具有重要意义。
AI.method: 通过定义t-结构与权结构的相邻关系，在满足Brown表示性质的范畴中证明存在性条件。研究从权结构构造t-结构的方法，包括严格正交t-结构的构造，并探讨这些结构在导出范畴中的应用。
AI.result: 证明了在满足Brown表示性质的范畴C中，与权结构w相邻的t-结构存在当且仅当w是smashing的。这种t-结构的心是那些保持积的函子范畴。还建立了从权结构构造t-结构的其他结果，可应用于射影概形的导出范畴。
AI.conclusion: t-结构与权结构之间的相邻关系提供了连接这两种重要结构的有力工具，特别是在满足Brown表示性质的范畴中。这些结果不仅推广了先前关于半正交分解的研究，还为代数几何中导出范畴的结构分析提供了新的视角和方法。

title: Topological rigidity of ${\mathrm{SL}}_2$-quotients
comment: 17 pages. Version 2: typos fixed, minor improvements in several places
summary: We investigate the homotopy type of a certain homogeneous space for a simple complex algebraic group. We calculate some of its classical topological invariants and introduce a new one. We also propose several conjectures about its topological rigidity.

AI.tldr: 研究简单复代数群齐次空间的同伦类型，计算经典拓扑不变量并引入新不变量，提出拓扑刚性猜想
AI.motivation: 研究简单复代数群齐次空间的拓扑性质，特别是其同伦类型，这对于理解代数几何与拓扑学之间的联系具有重要意义
AI.method: 计算齐次空间的经典拓扑不变量，并引入新的拓扑不变量来刻画其拓扑结构
AI.result: 获得了齐次空间的部分经典拓扑不变量计算结果，并提出了新的拓扑不变量
AI.conclusion: 该研究为理解简单复代数群齐次空间的拓扑性质提供了新视角，提出的拓扑刚性猜想为进一步研究指明了方向

title: The local converse theorem for quasi-split $O_{2n}$ and $SO_{2n}$
comment: Accepted at Canadian Journal of Mathematics
summary: Let $F$ be a non-archimedean local field of characteristic not equal to 2. In this paper, we prove the local converse theorem for quasi-split $Ø_{2n}(F)$ and $\SO_{2n}(F)$, via the description of the local theta correspondence between $Ø_{2n}(F)$ and $\Sp_{2n}(F)$. More precisely, as a main step, we explicitly describe the precise behavior of the $γ$-factors under the correspondence. Furthermore, we apply our results to prove the weak rigidity theorems for irreducible generic cuspidal automorphic representations of $Ø_{2n}(\A)$ and $\SO_{2n}(\mathbb{A})$, respectively, where $\A$ is a ring of adele of a global number field $L$.

AI.tldr: 本文证明了非阿基米德局部域上拟分裂正交群O_{2n}(F)和SO_{2n}(F)的局部逆定理，通过研究正交群与辛群之间的局部theta对应，并应用结果证明了整体域上相应群的弱刚性定理。
AI.motivation: 研究正交群的局部逆定理是表示论中的重要问题，特别是对于拟分裂正交群O_{2n}(F)和SO_{2n}(F)，通过theta对应的方法来建立这些群的局部逆定理。
AI.method: 利用局部theta对应描述O_{2n}(F)和Sp_{2n}(F)之间的对应关系，特别是明确描述γ因子在对应下的精确行为，以此作为证明局部逆定理的主要步骤。
AI.result: 证明了拟分裂正交群O_{2n}(F)和SO_{2n}(F)的局部逆定理，并将结果应用于证明整体域上相应群的不可约一般尖点自守表示的弱刚性定理。
AI.conclusion: 通过研究局部theta对应和γ因子的行为，成功建立了正交群的局部逆定理，并将这些局部结果推广到整体域上的弱刚性定理，为相关表示论研究提供了重要工具。

title: Triangular Prism Equations and Categorification
comment: 35 pages. Revised version. Fuchs-Runkel-Schweigert theorem replaces Wang's conjecture. Comments are welcome!
summary: We introduce the triangular prism equations (TPE) for fusion categories, obtained by evaluating triangular prisms in terms of tetrahedra. Using an oriented graphical calculus, we show that the geometric symmetries of the regular tetrahedron are preserved. In the spherical case, we prove that the TPE are equivalent to the pentagon equations after a suitable change of basis. These equations provide new insight for managing complexity via localization. As a consequence, and using the Fuchs-Runkel-Schweigert theorem on the second Frobenius-Schur indicator, we obtain new categorification criteria. As an application, we solve all remaining open cases to complete the classification of unitary 1-Frobenius simple integral fusion categories up to rank 8 and up to Frobenius-Perron dimension 20000.

AI.tldr: 该论文引入了融合范畴的三角棱柱方程，证明了在球面情况下与五边形方程等价，并应用这些结果完成了特定融合范畴的分类。
AI.motivation: 为了管理融合范畴的复杂性，作者希望通过引入新的方程（三角棱柱方程）来提供新的视角，并利用这些方程获得新的范畴化标准。
AI.method: 使用有向图形计算法引入三角棱柱方程，证明其保持正四面体的几何对称性，在球面情况下证明与五边形方程等价，并应用Fuchs-Runkel-Schweigert定理。
AI.result: 获得了新的范畴化标准，并解决了所有剩余开放案例，完成了秩不超过8且Frobenius-Perron维数不超过20000的酉1-Frobenius简单积分融合范畴的分类。
AI.conclusion: 三角棱柱方程为管理融合范畴的复杂性提供了新视角，其等价于五边形方程的性质使得能够获得新的范畴化标准，并成功应用于特定融合范畴的完整分类。
